thread.title: Bob Saget promises 'no cynicism' as he joins 'Hand to God'
thread.title_full: Bob Saget promises 'no cynicism' as he joins 'Hand to God'

author: MARK KENNEDY
title: Bob Saget promises 'no cynicism' as he joins 'Hand to God'
text:
Rich Fury Bob Saget promises 'no cynicism' as he joins 'Hand to God' 
FILE - In this June 5, 2015 file photo, Bob Saget arrives at the Cool Comedy: Hot Cuisine Gala Benefit in Beverly Hills, Calif. Saget joins the cast of "Hand to God" on Broadway, beginning Nov. 3. (Photo by Rich Fury/Invision/AP, File) Posted: Thursday, October 22, 2015 5:43 am Bob Saget promises 'no cynicism' as he joins 'Hand to God' Associated Press | 
NEW YORK (AP) — TV star and comedian Bob Saget is going to have to keep it together as the straight guy on Broadway this holiday season — no matter if he's being taunted by a dirty-mouthed puppet. 
Saget said the snarky guy who once hosted "America's Funniest Home Videos" can't show up when he steps into "Hand to God" as a simple-minded pastor in the Tony-nominated, dark satire.
